runs.comm: Zaheer starts with a wide delivery outside off, a hint of swing away after pitching well outside off
length ball outside off, crunched towards cover point where a diving Yuvraj stops it from racing away
length ball is guided down towards third man for a single
no one is stopping this one, short of length and a bit of width, Nazir gets on the back foot and slashes that past backward point for four, Nazir gets a boundary off his first ball
oh dear, that swings down the leg side, Dhoni was slow to get to that one, he doesn't collect it and gives away four extra runs
that seams away outside off, Nazir doesn't move his feet as he is sucked into playing at that, beaten
closer to the off stump this time, Nazir defends off the back foot to the off side
the third wide of the over, down the leg side once more, Dhoni gets his gloves on it this time, the ball rolls towards short fine

dropped, chance for Sehwag at slip, Zaheer finally gets his line right, just as people were being reminded of his infamous opening over in the 2003 World Cup final, batsman was playing across the line, gets the outside edge, went at a catchable height but well to the right of Sehwag, who gets his hands on it after diving but can't latch on, gets a second chance as he falls to the ground but he turfs it
superb start for Irfan, an inside-edge for four, Nazir is relieved to see the ball has missed the stumps

he's gone this time, lbw, Nazir was miles down the track but the umpire is happy that was going on to hit the stumps, that was short of a length and pitching on middle, and replays show that straightened enough to hit the top of middle, Nazir was unhappy with the decision as he walked off
surprise! Afridi in at No. 3, boom! first ball is blasted past mid-on for a boundary
short and wide from Irfan, Afridi throws his bat at it but missed
Irfan worried by Afridi power, hurls this too far outside off
a slower ball from Irfan, and a sight you don't see often when Afridi is on strike, he allows it through to the keeper
short and a bit of width, Afidi muscles it into the ground, bounces over the off-side field, Raina gave chase as the ball raced towards the sweeper cover boundary, the ball beats him to the rope
length ball on middle and leg, played towards midwicket
length ball outside off, defended off the front foot towards cover
back of a length and moving in towards the off stump, played off the back foot towards backward point
good line from Zaheer, heading for off stump that one, blocked towards extra cover, Hafeez is now 1 off 7, and has been put down once already
length ball outside off, Hafeez guides it down to third man for a single, five balls and one run this over from Zaheer, who has pulled it back after that forgettable first over
Afridi is not going to hang around here, a shortish ball is mowed towards square leg, Afridi really looking to massacre the ball there
a slightly slower one from Irfan,short of a length delivery that moves in a hint, Afridi swings at it and misses
pitched up and well outside off, Afridi is drawn towards that one, another swing and a miss, Irfan has third man in the ring, long-on is back
punched down to long-on for a single
calmly guided down to this third single down to third man
pitched up and that is thrashed towards long-on, Yuvraj is there, he does the fielding
length ball on the stumps, slammed towards extra cover, misfield by  Balaji, who might have got a bit of a bad bounce there
slower offcutter bouncer from wide of the crease, Afridi looks to swipe and edges it to the leg side, can't time it
length ball outside off, pushed towards point by Hafeez
another short one, Hafeez swivels as he pulls the ball along the ground towards deep square leg

the Afridi experiment is over, he has picked out the deep square leg fielder, another short one from Balaji, Afridi pulls and connects well this done, not well enough to clear the rope though, Raina gets under that one and safely pouches it
length ball on off stump, Jamshed gets going with a tuck towards midwicket
length ball just outside off, defended towards cover, Hafeez 4 off 12
inside-edge towards midwicket as Jamshed looks to push it from the off stump
from round the wicket, short of length ball on middle and leg, tapped to the leg side

worked towards wide mid-on for what should have been a single, a misfield there from Raina, allows the second, it could have been a tight one as well, Yuvraj was going to throw the ball to the keeper, then realises he should fire it in towards the non-striker's end, that gives Jamshed time to get back
nudged behind square leg
solidly defended off the front foot
length ball is scooped over cover by Jamshed, is in the air for ages but lands well wide of any of the fielders
flat, length ball sliding towards middle, defended off the front foot
bit more air, pitched up and just outside off, pushed towards extra cover, Hafeez 7 off 17
a touch short from Yuvraj, it spins in towards Hafeez, who gets on the back foot and whacks it towards midwicket

the magic of Yuvraj works again! a wicket in his first over, and it is the important one of Nasir Jamshed, who was looking to heave the ball from outside off to the leg side, he edges it through to Dhoni who is absolutely convinced there is bat involved, the umpire agrees and Pakistan are three down
played it off the back foot towards sweeper cover
length ball is pushed towards extra cover, and just two off the over
just outside off, worked towards short third man
length ball angling in, guided off the backfoot towards backward point
more defence from Hafeez, who is struggling badly to get going
length ball that Hafeez wants to thrash to the leg side, that rolls towards long-on
looks to sweep this one, edged towards square leg
gets well back in the crease and punches that towards mid-on, only three off the over, a good phase this for India
two runs to sweeper cover

another one for Yuvraj! Kamran Akmal is gone this time, that was pitched up by Yuvraj, just outside off, Kamran looks to hammer it through cover, a thin edge through to Dhoni, who throws up the ball in celebration even before appealing
eased towards long-on to bring up Pakistan's 50
pushed towards extra cover

length ball heading for middle for leg, worked towards deep square leg, Kohli rifles in the throw as Pakistan attempt a tight second, Dhoni looks to break the stumps without looking at them, he doesn't collect it properly though, would have been close that
bang! Hafeez stops pottering around, gets his first boundary with the innings almost halfway through, that is hammered towards midwicket, one bounce and over the ropes
a single to start Kohli's over
a full toss just outside off, squeezed towards backward point
full ball slanting down leg, the batsman had shuffled past the leg stump, and that thuds into his pads
length ball is thumped towards wide long-on, it was in the air for a while but it was a controlled hit

Pakistan imploding here, Hafeez has played on here, and Kohli has struck with an innocuous delivery that takes out the leg stump, Hafeez had made room and wanted to steer that ball from beyond the leg stump to the off side, edged into the ground and then onto the stumps, Pakistan will need runs from the two Umars again
eased towards long-on for a single
length ball slides towards middle, defended from the crease
clipped towards backward square leg
worked towards long-on for a single
another single to long-on as Pakistan look to re-build this innings
length ball, a bit of air, that hastens on, Umar looking to cut but misses
punched towards mid-on for a single
Kohli oversteps as he bowls a full, wide one, squeezed towards backward point
Malik gets the boundary off that one, it was full and outside off, Malik bends his knee and carves that low full toss to the sweeper cover boundary
full and on the pads, worked towards midwicket
length ball on off stump, worked towards mid-on
shorter and outside off, Malik waits for that on the back foot, cleverly places it past the short third man fielder, Balaji dives but can't stop it, another boundary for Malik
full ball on the pads, eased towards long-on
full once more, on middle stump, helped towards deep square leg, Gambhir races in from the boundary, the batsman take his throw on and get back for the second
a length ball is guided towards deep backward point, Ashwin isn't too athletic, two runs taken
back of a length ball is pushed towards long-on
length ball is swatted towards deep midwicket, Kohli fields
smash! Umar Akmal clubs that short of length ball that sat up, Umar gets on the front foot and dismisses that over the midwicket boundary
length ball well outside off, guided down to third man for a single

what's going on here? length ball just outside off, Malik gets outside off and looks to work the ball to the leg side, struck on the pads and the ball rolls towards square leg, Irfan part appeal for an lbw before chasing after the ball, both batsmen take several steps down the track before stopping, have a conversation mid-pitch as Irfan scampers to field that one
wide down the leg side
defended towards short cover
carrom ball pitching outside leg, Akmal waits on the back foot and helps it behind square leg for a single
length ball is pushed back to Ashwin
a good over this from Ashwin, Malik defends to the leg side
a bit short and outside off, Malik is terrific on the cut, sends the ball towards deep point
length ball on the pads, Malik comes down the track and guides the ball towards long-on, good over that from Ashwin
shortish ball outside off, steered down towards third man
short once more, Balaji keeps it around off, Umar gets on his toes as he works the ball towards third man
length ball on the pads, whipped towards deep square leg for a couple, Pakistan's 100 comes up
slower bouncer from Balaji, one bounce towards Yuvraj at backward point

length ball this time, slants it towards the pads, glanced down to the vacant fine leg region, Zaheer at backward square leg was too square to cut that off, and not for the first time, Malik playing a good hand against India
length ball is punched towards cover, dot ball to end the over
pushed towards mid-on for a single

the end of Malik, and not the best of strokes from him to end a fluent innings, a length ball from round the wicket, Malik swipes at it, only as far as midwicket, who takes the catch chest high,that was off the toe end of the bat, just as Pakistan seemed to be getting some momentum, they lose another wicket
length ball from over the stumps, a quicker one going straight on, played towards cover
pushed towards long-off for a single
pitched up, on middle and leg, worked in front of square leg
length ball outside off, guided towards deep backward point, 'two, two,' is the initial call but the batsmen realise there isn't a second, just four off that Ashwin over
length ball outside off, guided towards backward point by Yasir Arafat
back of a length ball outside off, bottom-edged to the off side
shorter this time from Balaji, slapped towards Yuvraj at backward point
the slower bouncer has Arafat baffled, the ball takes an age to arrive and Arafat can only weakly waft at it
if it was to give Umar the strike, Arafat hasn't heeded it, he goes for a wild swipe to midwicket, top-edges it and that bounces once before going over the third man rope
swings at it once more, towards deep midwicket, Kohli keeps them down to a single, which means Arafat remains on strike, only five off that over
Arafat does well to turn over the strike to Umar, works the ball to mid-on for a single
a carrom ball pitching outside leg, edges it to the off side

another one down, a touch short from Ashwin, Umar Akmal shaped up for a big mow, it seemed like the right ball to dispatch, he doesn't get enough on it though and Raina collects it and looks to the crowd, cupping his ear to suggest he can't hear them, a frustrated Umar bangs his bat on the track
defends his first ball to short midwicket
more watchful defence from Gul
the attempted big hit arrives, looking to sweep it, he misses, Ashwin finishes with impeccable figures of 4-0-16-2

short of length bowled wide of the crease, slapped towards Yuvraj at backward point, and that throw from Yuvraj is bang-on perfect, one bounce and hitting the top of middle, Zaheer was in position to collect the throw, he realised that was heading for the stumps and gets his hands out of the way, Arafat is an inch short, he is on his way, Yuvraj answering his critics here

shortish ball, Gul swings at it and gets a bottom-edge, that runs down towards fine leg, Balaji races across and puts in the dive to stop that one, but he pushes it back onto his chest as he slides and the ball deflects over the rope, great effort there but to no avail
a yorker from Zaheer, squeezed out towards cover for a single
short from Zaheer, pulled towards deep square leg
a low full toss from over the wickets, thumped back towards Zaheer, who does well to stop that
full and wide outside off, dug out towards midwicket for a single
swing and a miss, that was well outside off but the batsman wanted to still club that to the leg side
a poor delivery from Balaji, a full toss on the pads, Gul can hit those all day, swung over deep square leg for six

a high full toss from around the stumps this time, Gul could have smashed that where he liked, instead he gets an edge on it and the ball swirls to Dhoni, can Pakistan at least last the full 20 overs?
no, they can't! Pakistan are bowled out for 128, Ajmal looks to paddle his first delivery to fine leg, he doesn't quite get hold of it and Dhoni has another simple catch
